entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is recognized by Harry as he sneaks into the Forest while everyone else is at dinner. He is described as having a 'prowling walk'.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is mentioned as being present in the shadowy clearing with Snape, stuttering worse than ever.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as flying on his broomstick and following Snape into the Forest. He tries to catch what Snape and Quirrell are saying.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: Nimbus Two Thousand is Harry's broomstick that he uses to fly over the castle and follow Snape into the Forest.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The Forest is where Snape sneaks in while everyone else is at dinner. Harry follows him there on his broomstick.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is mentioned as the place where everyone else is having dinner while Snape sneaks into the Forest.

relationships.description: Snape and Quirrell are meeting in a shadowy clearing in the Forest. They seem to be discussing something, with Snape being more composed than Quirrell.
Harry is following Snape into the Forest on his broomstick, trying to catch what they are saying. He lands noiselessly in a towering beech tree and tries to see through the leaves.
